URLSearchParamsToString.summary:
The toString() method of the
interface returns a query string suitable for use in a
URL.

blockquote.para:
Note: This method returns the query string without the question
mark. This is different from window.location.search,
which includes it.

remarks.para:
-The interface.
-Google Developers: Easy URL manipulation with URLSearchParams

URLSearchParamsToString.returns:
A string, without the question mark. (Returns an empty string if no
search parameters have been set.)
